data.title: Bird Watching at Tanguar Haor
data.description: The wetlands came alive with hundreds of migratory birds flying in sync. I spent hours watching them dive and glide across the water. The sound of flapping wings and nature’s stillness was unforgettable.

data.title: Exploring Mahasthangarh
data.description: Walking through the ancient ruins of Mahasthangarh was like stepping into history. The air was still, and the broken walls whispered tales of civilizations long gone. A truly humbling experience.

data.title: Hiking Nilgiri Hills
data.description: We started the hike before sunrise and reached the top just in time to watch the valley wake up. The clouds floated beneath our feet, and the breeze was refreshingly cool. A moment of pure peace.

data.title: Boat Ride in Sajek
data.description: We explored the river early in the morning. The fog gently floated above the water, and everything felt like a dream. Local kids waved at us from the banks while the hills echoed with the sound of our paddles.

data.title: Rangamati
data.description: Witnessed the most beautiful sunset ever! The sky was painted in golden and purple hues as the sun dipped below the hills. The calm lake reflected the colors like a mirror—truly mesmerizing.
